st: Mana Ke Pyar Kisi Ka Mere Paas Nahi,
s:
Mana Ke Pyar Kisi Ka Mere Paas Nahi,
Magar Tunhein Meri Mohabbat Ka Ehsaas Nahi,

Jaane Pee Gaye Hum Kitne Gham E Aansu,
Ab Kuchh Aur Peene Ki Pyaas Nahi…

st: Pasand Karta Hun Har Haseeno Ko,
s:
Pasand Karta Hun Har Haseeno Ko,
Magar Dil Mein Basane Ke Liye Jagah Nahi,

Thukra Dete Hain Begane Samajhkar,
Uski Hoti Koi Thukraane Ki Vajah Nahi…

st: Nazrein Meri Kahin Thak Na Jaayein,
s:
Nazrein Meri Kahin Thak Na Jaayein,
Bewafa Tera Intezaar Karte Karte,

Yeh Jaan Yun Hi Nikal Na Jaaye,
Tum Se Ishq Ka Izhaar Karte Karte…

st: Tum Hi Tum Tadpo Na Hamein Tadpaao,
s:
Tum Hi Tum Tadpo Na Hamein Tadpaao,
Do Roohein Milne Do Ek Jaan Ban Jaao,

Deti Ho Meri Bhool Ki Itni Badi Saja,
Thukra Ke Mera Pyar Na Ban Jaao Bewafa…

st: Koi Toh Inteha Hogi Mere Pyar Ki Khuda,
s:
Koi Toh Inteha Hogi Mere Pyar Ki Khuda,
Kab Tak Dega Tu Is Kadar Hamein Saja,

Nikal Le Tu Is Jism Se Jaan Meri,
Yah Mila De Mujhko Meri Dilruba…

st: Jabse Mulakat Huyi Hai Unse Meri,
s:
Jabse Mulakat Huyi Hai Unse Meri,
Tabse Mere Dil Ko Karaar Aaya,

Kabhi Zulph Lahraai Kabhi Nakhara Kiya,
Unki In Adaaon Par Bahut Pyar Aaya…..

st: Dil Par Na Mere Yun Waar Kijiye,
s:
Dil Par Na Mere Yun Waar Kijiye,
Chodo Yeh Nafrat Thoda Pyar Kijiye,

Tadapte Hain Jis Kadar Tere Pyar Mein Hum,
Kabhi Khud Ko Bhi Us Kadar Bekraar Kijiye….

st: Tarsegi Tu Pyar Ke Liye Tamam Umar,
s:
Tarsegi Tu Pyar Ke Liye Tamam Umar,
Ab Yaar Tujhe Main Aisi Saja Dunga,

Yaad Karegi Jab Tu Mere Pyar Ko,
Magar Us Din Main Tujhe Bhula Dunga….

st: Kya-Kya Na Saha Tere Pyar Ke Liye,
s:
Kya-Kya Na Saha Tere Pyar Ke Liye,
Tu Bhul Gayee Mujhe Begaane Yaar Ke Liye,

Bitaaye The Lamhe Saath Milkar Kabhi,
Tarsate Hain Aaj Tere Deedar Ke Liye….

st: Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
s:
Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
Aur Yeh Zindagi Hum Se Rooth Jaaye,

Ek Doosre Ke Pyar Mein Kho Jaayein Iss Kadar ,
Ke Hum Saare Ghamon Ko Bhool Jayein….

st: Kya Hasino Se Dil Lagate Ho,
s:
Kya Hasino Se Dil Lagate Ho,
Kabhi Zindagi Ka Maza Bhi Uthaiye

Pyar Milna, Nahi Milna, Kismat Ke Haath Hai,
Kisi Ko Itni Jaldi Na Khuda Banaiye…..

st: Zindgi Ham Tujhe Thokar Maar Dete,
s:
Zindgi Ham Tujhe Thokar Maar Dete,
Agar Main Akela Hi Tera Hakdar Hota,

Ham Khushi Ko Gale Laga Lete,
Agar Nai Hume Ghamon Se Pyar Hota…

st: Dil Se Tera Pyar Hoga Kam Nahi,
s:
Dil Se Tera Pyar Hoga Kam Nahi,
Tum Bewafa Huve Toh Kya, Aur Ek Gham Sahi,

Aapka Faisla Aapke Karm Karenge,
Sab Kuchh Milega Tumhe Magar Honge Hum Nahi…..

st: Zindgi Mujhe Jeene Ke Liye Dua Chahiye,
s:
Zindgi Mujhe Jeene Ke Liye Dua Chahiye,
Us Par Kismat Ki Bhi Wafa Chahiye,

Khuda Ke Raham Se Sab Kuchh Hai Mere Paas,
Bas Pyar Karne Ke Liye Mahbooba Chahiye….

st: Aapke Pyar Mein Payi Hain Ehsi Sajayein,
s:
Aapke Pyar Mein Payi Hain Ehsi Sajayein,
Ke Khud Ke Saath Mein Ho Gaye Hum Paraye,

Aapne Toh Apne Halaat Bataa Diye Mujhe,
Magar Hum Kiske Saamne Yahan Aansu Bahayein….

st: Mana Hum Aapke Kaabil Nahi,
s:
Mana Hum Aapke Kaabil Nahi,
Samne Hokar Bhi Nazar Aati Manzil Nahi,

Ghame Apne Pyar Mein Tadapne Se,
Hoga Sanam Kuchh Bhi Hashil Nahi….

st: Baadal Barasne Ka Mausam Hota Hai,
s:
Baadal Barasne Ka Mausam Hota Hai,
Aankhe Barasne Ka Mausam Koi Nahi,

Hum Tere Pyar Mein Gham E Zaher Peete Rahe,
Phir Bhi Ek Boond Aansu Tu Royi Nahi…

st: Agar Yeh Jeevan Jal Bhi Jaye,
s:
Agar Yeh Jeevan Jal Bhi Jaye,
Too Aansu Na Bahana Toh Eh Dost,

Zeevan Chaahe Tadap Bhi Jaaye,
To Phir Bhi Naa Tu Pyar Jataana….

st: Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
s:
Is Se Pahle Ki Saare Khwab Toot Jaayein ,
Aur Yeh Zindagi Hum Se Rooth Jaaye,

Ek Doosre Ke Pyar Mein Kho Jaayein Iss Kadar ,
Ke Hum Saare Ghamon Ko Bhool Jaayein….

st: Khushion Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
s:
Khushion Se Naraz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Pyar Ki Mohtaz Hai Meri Zindagi,
Has Leta Hoon Logon Ko Dikhane Ke Liye,
Varna Dard Ki Kitaab Hai Meri Zindagi…

st: Meri Zindagi Ghamon Se Ho Gayi Hai Taar
s:
Meri Zindagi Ghamon Se Ho Gayi Hai Taar
Khushiyan Bhi Mere Kareeb Nahi Aaati
Zamane Bhar Ka Zeher Pee Liya Humne
Jaan Hai Ki Kambhaqt Nikal Nahi Jaati…

st: Kehte Hai Gam Baatne Se Hota Hai Kam,
s:
Kehte Hai Gam Baatne Se Hota Hai Kam,
Aisa Hi Kabhi Pele Maante The Hum,

Tere Pyar Ki Nishani Tera Gam Hi To Hai Mere Paas,
Wo Bhi Baatdu To Rahega Kya Mere Paas,

Sochta Hoon In Sagar Ki Lehro Ko Dekh Kar,
Kyon Yeh Kinaro Se Takra Kar Palat Jati Hai,

Karti Hai Vo Kinare Se Bewafai Ya Fir Sagar Se Wafa Nibhati Hai…

st: Nafrat Thi Hamsea To Pyar Kyo Kiya,
s:
Nafrat Thi Hamsea To Pyar Kyo Kiya,
Dena Tha Jahar To Ikrar Kyo Kiya,
De Ke Jahar Ab Kahte Ho Ki Pina Hi Hoga,
Or Jab Pi Gye To Kahte Ho Jina Hi Hoga…

st: Aankhe To Pyar Mein Dill Ki Juban Hoti Hai,
s:
Aankhe To Pyar Mein Dill Ki Juban Hoti Hai,
Chahat To Sada Bejuban Hoti Hai,
Pyar Mein Dard Bhi Mile To Kya Ghabrana,
Suna Hai Dard Se Chahat Or Jawan Hoti Hai…

st: Jab Ho Aapka Pyara Sa Saath,
s:
Jab Ho Aapka Pyara Sa Saath,
Aur Ho Haathon Mein Haath,
Tanhai Ho….Rangeen Ho Sama Jahan Koi Aur Nahi,
Sirf Aap Aur Hum Ho Wahan,
Tab Hogi Barsaat Pyar Ki,
Mere Aur Sirf Mere Pyar Ki…

st: Humne Dekhi Hai In Aankhon Ki Mehakti Khusbu,
s:
Humne Dekhi Hai In Aankhon Ki Mehakti Khusbu,
Haath Se Chhu Ke Ise Ishq Ka Ilzaam Na Do,

Ek Ehsaas Hai Ise Rooh Se Mehsoos Karo,
Pyar Ko Pyar Hi Rahne Do Ise Koi Dusra Naam Na Do…

st: Kyo Koi Chah Kar Dosti Nibha Nahi Pata,
s:
Kyo Koi Chah Kar Dosti Nibha Nahi Pata,
Kyo Koi Chah Kar Rishta Bana Nahi Pata,
Kyo Leti Hai Zindagi Aisi Karwat,
Ki Koi Chahkar Bhi Pyar Jata Nahi Pata…

st: Pyar Aankho Se Jataya To Bura Maan Gaye,
s:
Pyar Aankho Se Jataya To Bura Maan Gaye,
Haal-E-Dil Humne Sunaya To Bura Maan Gaye,

Woh To Har Roz Rulaya Karte They,
Ek Roz Humne Rulaya To Bura Maan Gaye,

st: Dil Ka Rishta Hai Hamara
s:
Dil Ka Rishta Hai Hamara
Dil Ke Kone Mein Naam Hai Tumhara
Har Yaad Mein Hai Chehra Tumhara
Hum Sath Nhi To Kya Hua
Zindagi Bhar Pyar Nibhane Ka Wada Hai Hamara…

st: Ae Khuda Salaamat Rakhna Unko,
s:
Ae Khuda Salaamat Rakhna Unko,
Jo Humse Nafrat Karte Hain,
Pyar Na Sahi Nafrat Hi Sahi,
Kuchh To Hai Jo Wo Sirf Humse Karte Hain…

st: Itna Pyaar Na Kar, Ke, Ishq Bhi,
s:
Itna Pyaar Na Kar, Ke, Ishq Bhi,
Ro Padega Teri Wafa Dekh Kar,

Tum Milo Na Milo Par,
Rab Zaroor Jal Uthega, Tumhara Junoon Dekh Kar….

st: Chand Taare Toh Na La Sakunga, Main Tere Liye,
s:
Chand Taare Toh Na La Sakunga, Main Tere Liye,
Magar Aakhiri Sans Bhi Meri Tere Naam Hai,

Tune Boond Se Bana Diya Hai Sagar Mujhko,
Tere Pyar Ko, Mere Hamdam, Mera Salaam Hai….

st: Lakhon The Log Teri Is Duniya Mein,
s:
Lakhon The Log Teri Is Duniya Mein,
Fir Meri Hi Jholi Mein Gham Kyu Dale Hain,

Humko Bhi Dekho, Hain Nadan Kitne,
Humne Bhi Sab Ke Hi Jakham Paale Hain…

st: Hasrat Sirf Tumhe Paane Ki,
s:
Hasrat Sirf Tumhe Paane Ki,
Aur Koi Khwaish Nahi Is Parwane Ki,

Gham Ki Aandhi Aisi Chali, Hum Tum Bichhud Gaye,
Aansu Bhi Apne Puchhne Lage, Aapke Saathi Kidhar Gaye…

st: Aitbaar Tum Par Kya Karte,
s:
Aitbaar Tum Par Kya Karte,
Pyar Tumse Kya Karte,

Kadar Nahi Tumhe Pyar Ki,
Ikrar Tumse Kya Karte…

st: Hum Pyar Aapse Karte Hain Dil O Jaan Se Sanam,
s:
Hum Pyar Aapse Karte Hain Dil O Jaan Se Sanam,
Is Baat Ka Aapko Aitbaar Kyu Nahi Aata,

Na Jaane Kaisa Pather Hai Yeh Dil Bhi Aapka,
Aap Ko Hum Par Kabhi Bhi Pyar Kyu Nahi Hota…

st: Tere Bol Lagte Hain Pyare Mujhko,
s:
Tere Bol Lagte Hain Pyare Mujhko,
Tu Sabse Pyara Hai Hi Yaara,

Kin Achhe Karmon Se Mila Hai Tu,
Tera Sath Jeene Ka Sahara Hai…

st: Main Kisi Aur Se Kya Mangu Mere Mola,
s:
Main Kisi Aur Se Kya Mangu Mere Mola,
Jab Tu Hi Kuchh Dene Ko Taiyar Nahi Hai,

Sab Ko Hi Bantata Hai Khusiyan Sada,
Kyu Sagar Se Fir Tujhe Kyu Pyar Nahi….

st: Pyar Karta Hun Main Jinko Khuda,
s:
Pyar Karta Hun Main Jinko Khuda,
Khush Rakhna Unhe Yeh Fariyad Karta Hun,

Bhale Hi Bhool Gaye Hon Woh Mujhko,
Magar Main Ahr Pal Unko Yaad Karta Hun…

st: Na Chahte Huye Bhi Tumse Pyar Kiya,
s:
Na Chahte Huye Bhi Tumse Pyar Kiya,
Humne Toh Sada Tumhara Aitbaar Kiya,

Is Se Badkar Pyar Ka Du Kya Saboot,
Aakhiri Sans Tak Tumhara Aitbaar Kiya…

st: Najar Na Lag Jaaye Kahin Aapko Kisi Ki,
s:
Najar Na Lag Jaaye Kahin Aapko Kisi Ki,
Sari Duniya Se Chhupakar Aa Rakh Lu Tujhko,

Bas Itni Si Aarju Hai Hamari Toh Jeevan Mein,
Har Janm Mein Pyar Milta Rahe Aapka Mujhko…

st: Tere Hi Dam Se Zinda Hun Yaar,
s:
Tere Hi Dam Se Zinda Hun Yaar,
Sirf Tumhi Se Karta Hun Main Pyar,

Jaan Ho Meri Tum Ho Mera Karar,
Sirf Tumhi Se Karta Hun Main Pyar…

st: Kya Karein Hamari Fitrat Hi Aisi Hai,
s:
Kya Karein Hamari Fitrat Hi Aisi Hai,
Jo Har Kisi Se Pyar Kar Lete Hain,

Tabhi Toh Dokha Khate Hain Hum Yahan Par,
Jo Har Kisi Par Aitbaar Kar Lete Hain….

st: Is Liye Karta Nahi Yeh Mohabbat Kisi Se,
s:
Is Liye Karta Nahi Yeh Mohabbat Kisi Se,
Judayi Yaar Ki Is Se Sahi Jaayegi Nahi,

Koi Puchh Baitha Jo Sabab Hamare Rone Ka,
Dastaa Pyar Ki Bhi Kahi Jaayegi Nahi…

st: Jeevan Mein Bas Aap Se Hi Pyaar Kiya Tha,
s:
Jeevan Mein Bas Aap Se Hi Pyaar Kiya Tha,
Aapse Hi Toh Mohabbt Ka Izhaar Kiya Tha,

Agar Chhodna Tha Yun Hi Toh Inkar Kar Dete,
Tab Toh Aapne Bhi Dil Se Ikrar Kiya Tha….

st: Unhe Nafrat Thi Humse Toh Izhaar Kyu Kiya,
s:
Unhe Nafrat Thi Humse Toh Izhaar Kyu Kiya,
Dena Tha Zahar Toh Pyar Kyu Kiya,

De Kar Zahar Bole Peena Hoga,
Jab Pee Gaye To Bole Tumhe Meri Kasam Jeena Hoga…

st: Agar Zindagi Mein Kabhi Pyar Hum Karenge,
s:
Agar Zindagi Mein Kabhi Pyar Hum Karenge,
Har Haal Mein Us Pe Aitbar Hum Karenge,

Karenge Hum Sada Poori Har Aarju Uski,
Wada Raha Na Kabhi Takrar Hum Karenge…

st: Agar Thak Jaao Kabhi Toh Humse Kahna,
s:
Agar Thak Jaao Kabhi Toh Humse Kahna,
Hum Utha Lenge Tumko Apni Baahon Mein,

Aap Ek Baar Pyar Karke Toh Dekho Humse,
Hum Khusiyan Bichha Denge Aapki Raahon Mein…

st: Bhale Kitne Hi Khafa Hote Ho Tum Hamse,
s:
Bhale Kitne Hi Khafa Hote Ho Tum Hamse,
Magar Paas Hote Ho Toh Sab Achha Lagta Hai,

Baaki Saari Kaynat Lagti Hai Jhooti Si,
Bas Ek Aapka Pyar Sachha Lagta Hai…

st: Aap Jaise Hi The Sabhi, Aur Bhi Jo Mile Mujhko,
s:
Aap Jaise Hi The Sabhi, Aur Bhi Jo Mile Mujhko,
Fir Kaise Unmein Se Kisi Ko Apna Bana Lete,

Ek Aap Hi Ka Pyar Na Raas Aaya Hai Humko,
Fir Un Se Kaise Eh Dost Aur Jakham Kha Lete….

st: Koi Bhi Insan Jahan Mein Hamein Sachha Nahi Lagta,
s:
Koi Bhi Insan Jahan Mein Hamein Sachha Nahi Lagta,
Dar Dar Bhatkna Pyar Mein Hamein Achha Nahi Lagta,

Mali Ne Kaha Tha Ki Aur Bhi Hain Phool Chaman Mein,
Magar Kya Karein Har Phool Hamein Achha Nahi Lagta…

st: Aapki Pooja Karte Hain Hum,
s:
Aapki Pooja Karte Hain Hum,
Aap Par Hi Bas Marte Hain Hum,

Sagar Ko Aapse Bahut Pyar Hai,
Aapko Kahne Se Darte Hain Hum…

st: Kyon Mere Dil Ko Diye Hain Jakham Aapne,
s:
Kyon Mere Dil Ko Diye Hain Jakham Aapne,
Kyon Mere Pyar Ko Aapne Aise Bhula Diya,

Wada Toh Kiya Tha Saath Nibhane Ka Magar,
Kyun Sagar Ko Fir Aise Hai Daga Diya…

st: Saath Chhod Doge Aap Hamara,
s:
Saath Chhod Doge Aap Hamara,
Aisa Toh Hamara Ikrar Nahi Tha,

Log Uthayein Hamari Dosti Par Ungali,
Aisa Toh Hamara Pyar Nahi Tha…

st: Woh Mousam Pyar Ka Eh Mere Dost,
s:
Woh Mousam Pyar Ka Eh Mere Dost,
Na Jaane Kyu Hardam Yaad Aata Hai,

Jab Bhi Hota Hai Akela Kabhi Sagar,
Na Jaane Kyu Isko Bahut Rulata Hai…

st: Main Jeeta Raha Hun Ghut Ghut Ke Yaaro,
s:
Main Jeeta Raha Hun Ghut Ghut Ke Yaaro,
Mujhe Ab Jeene Ki Tamanna Nahi Hai,

Yeh Jo Humne Kiya Hai Pyar Tumse,
Yeh Dil Ki Lagi Hai Dilaagi Nahii Hai…

st: Apni Is Zindagi Ke Baare Mein Sochkar,
s:
Apni Is Zindagi Ke Baare Mein Sochkar,
Na Jaane Kyu Mera Dil Bekarar Hone Laga,

Log Toh Darte Hain Mout Ke Paas Aane Se,
Magar Sagr Ko Is Se Pyar Hone Laga…

st: Aapne Toh Ki Thi Dillagi Magar,
s:
Aapne Toh Ki Thi Dillagi Magar,
Hum Toh Dil Apna Tod Baithe,

Aapne Samjha Pyar Ko Khel Magar,
Hum Toh Ghamon Se Nata Jod Baithe…

st: Yeh Sach Nahi Hai Eh Mere Ajij Dost,
s:
Yeh Sach Nahi Hai Eh Mere Ajij Dost,
Ki Humne Kabhi Bhi Yahan Pyar Nahi Kiya,

Pyar Toh Humne Bhi Kiya Tha Kisi Se Magar,
Yeh Sach Ahi Ki Kabhi Ijhaar Nahi Kiya…

st: Aap Humse Na Milte Toh Achha Tha,
s:
Aap Humse Na Milte Toh Achha Tha,
Humaise Kisi Se Pyar Toh Na Karte,

Yeh Rahta Kambhakt Paas Hamare Hi,
Dil Apne Ko Yun Bekarar Toh Na Karte…

st: Kuchh Aise Bhi Log Hain Duniya Mein,
s:
Kuchh Aise Bhi Log Hain Duniya Mein,
Jinhe Pyar Ke Badle Hai Pyar Mila,

Magar Hamari Toh Aisi Kismat Hai,
Jisko Chaha, Nahi Woh Yaar Mila…

st: Woh Humko Jaan Se Bhi Pyare Hain,
s:
Woh Humko Jaan Se Bhi Pyare Hain,
Jo Hamare Dil Ke Mehman Hain,

Woh Bhi Jaante Hain Sabkucch Magar,
Jaan Bujhkar Bante Anjaan Hain…

st: Jinhe Hum Pyar Karte Hain,
s:
Jinhe Hum Pyar Karte Hain,
Unko Bata Bhi Nahi Sakte,
Dekhiye Majboori Sagar Ki,
Unhe Hum Paa Bhi Nahi Sakte,

st: Jo Pal Gujare Saath Unke,
s:
Jo Pal Gujare Saath Unke,
Woh Pal Bahut Yaad Aate Hain,
Jab Bhi Hum Tanha Hote Hain,
Yeh Humko Bahut Rulate Hain…

st: Har Dard Ko Toh Mitana Mushkil Hota Hai,
s:
Har Dard Ko Toh Mitana Mushkil Hota Hai,
Gujri Yaadon Ko Bhulana Muskil Hota Hai,

Aur Baaton Ko Toh Hum Bhula Sakte Hain Sagar,
Magar Pahle Pyar Ko Bhulana Muskil Hota Hai…

st: Main Toh Yeh Bhi Nahi Kah Sakta Sagar,
s:
Main Toh Yeh Bhi Nahi Kah Sakta Sagar,
Ki Is Mein Galti Mere Yaar Ki Hai,

Bewafa Bhi Usko Main Kahun Kaise,
Kyun Ki Toheen Yeh Mere Pyar Ki Hai…

st: Aap Yeh Kyun Chahte Hain Ki Hum Pyar Karein,
s:
Aap Yeh Kyun Chahte Hain Ki Hum Pyar Karein,
Jabki Hum Kisi Se Pyar Karna Nahi Chahte,

Aap Kyun Mangate Hain Dil Hamara Baar Baar,
Jabki Hum Dil Bekarar Karna Nahi Chahte…

st: Sab Kuchh Mila Sagar Ko Zindagi Mein,
s:
Sab Kuchh Mila Sagar Ko Zindagi Mein,
Magar Ek Pyar Na Mila Kisi Ka,

Sab Mujhko Samajhte Hain Apna Humdard,
Magar Ek Aitbaar Na Mila Kisi Ka…

st: Bharosa Nahi Raha Ise Jab Apni Zindagi Ka,
s:
Bharosa Nahi Raha Ise Jab Apni Zindagi Ka,
Bataao Yeh Kisi Aur Ka Aitbar Kare Kaise,

Ek Baar Toh Kha Chuka Hai Yeh Dhoka Pyar Mein,
Ab Aur Kisi Se Batao Pyar Kare Kaise…

st: Aapko Dekhkar Aaj Kahin,
s:
Aapko Dekhkar Aaj Kahin,
Hamara Dil Bekarar Na Ho Jaaye,
Lag Raha Hai Aaj Dar Humko,
Kahin Aapse Pyar Na Ho Jaaye….

st: Khush Rahein Bas Aap Hamesha,
s:
Khush Rahein Bas Aap Hamesha,
Dil Se Hum Fariyaad Karte Hain,
Aap Humko Bhale Bhol Chuke Ho,
Magar Hum Aapko Yaad Karte Hain…

st: Koi Toh Hota Jo Samjhata Sagar Ko,
s:
Koi Toh Hota Jo Samjhata Sagar Ko,
Ki Yahan Kisi Se Na Pyar Karna Chahiye,
Koi Bhi Nahi Banta Kisi Ka Apna,
Yahan Kisi Par Na Aitbaar Karna Chahiye…

st: Jo Jakham De Gaye Aap Sagar Ko,
s:
Jo Jakham De Gaye Aap Sagar Ko,
Na Jaane Kyun Woh Jakham Nahi Bharta,
Hum Toh Milna Chahte Hain Aapse Magar,
Kya Karein Hamara Naseeba Nahi Milta….

st: Khusiyan Humko Koi Deta Nahi Hai Yahan,
s:
Khusiyan Humko Koi Deta Nahi Hai Yahan,
Gham Apne Kisi Ko Dena Nahi Chahte,

Kahte Hain Paas Rahne Se Pyar Kam Hota Hai,
Isliye Kisi Ke Paas Bhi Rahna Nahi Chahte…

st: Kismat Kisi Ki Kisi Se Ruthe Na,
s:
Kismat Kisi Ki Kisi Se Ruthe Na,
Yeh Saath Kisi Ka Bhi Kisi Se Chhute Na,

Eh Sagar Pyar Karna Soch Samajhkar,
Dekhna Dil Kahin Kisi Ka Tute Na…

st: Jo Sararat Ki Unhone Kal Humse,
s:
Jo Sararat Ki Unhone Kal Humse,
Us Ada Par Dil Nishaar Kar Baithe,

Dil Toh Chahta Tha Badla Lein Unse,
Na Jaane Kyu Unse Pyar Kar Baiyhe….

st: Kitna Pyar Karte Hain Hum Unse,
s:
Kitna Pyar Karte Hain Hum Unse,
Kaash Unko Bhi Yeh Ehsaas Ho Jaaye,

Magar Aisa Na Ho Ke Hosh Mein Tab Aayein,
Jab Sagar Yeh Gahri Neend Mein So Jaaye…

st: Pyar Toh Hum Bhi Karte Hain Aapse,
s:
Pyar Toh Hum Bhi Karte Hain Aapse,
Magar Kya Karein Hamari Nigaahein Juda Hain,

Chahte Toh Hain Hum Bhi Aapke Saath Chalna,
Magar Kya Karin Hamari Raaheein Juda Hain…

st: Hum Kyun Kisi Se Aankhe Chaar Kake Dekhein,
s:
Hum Kyun Kisi Se Aankhe Chaar Kake Dekhein,
Hum Kyu Apne Dil Ko Bekarar Karke Dekhein,

Jab Pyar Ka Apne Ijhaar Kar Nahi Sakte,
Fir Kyu Hum Kisi Se Pyar Karke Dekhein..

st: Kya Batayein Aapko Hum Apni Majburiyan,
s:
Kya Batayein Aapko Hum Apni Majburiyan,
Ki Kyu Aapko Hum Apna Bana Na Sake,

Bas Samajh Lijiye Sagar Ki Badnaseebi Thi,
Jo Aapke Pyar Ko Bhi Hum Pa Na Sake…

st: Pyar Hamein Yun Hona Tha So Ho Gaya,
s:
Pyar Hamein Yun Hona Tha So Ho Gaya,
Dil Ko Hamare Khona Tha So Kho Gaya,

Na Tujhse Koi Ranjish Na Koi Shikwa Hai,
Gham Ko Hamara Hona Tha So Ho Gaya….

st: Sukar Karte Hain Hum Us Khuda Ka,
s:
Sukar Karte Hain Hum Us Khuda Ka,
Jisne Aapko Hum Se Mila Diya,

Aap Ho Na Sake Hamaare Toh Kya Hua,
Sagar Ko Toh Pyar Sikha Diya…

st: Agar Hum Na Mile Hote Unse,
s:
Agar Hum Na Mile Hote Unse,
To Yeh Dil Na Yun Bekarar Hota,

Na Najrein Milti Unse Kabhi,
Na Humko Un Se Pyar Hota…

st: Aap, Ab Aaye Ho Zindagi Mein Hamari,
s:
Aap, Ab Aaye Ho Zindagi Mein Hamari,
Jab Hum Sabko Aajma Chuke Hain,

Aap, Ab Kahte Hain Ki Pyar Karein,
Jab Hasino Se Dokha Kha Chuke Hain…

st: Husn Ko Pyar Mein Kyu Laate Ho Tum,
s:
Husn Ko Pyar Mein Kyu Laate Ho Tum,
Husn Ko Toh Hum Parvaah Nahi Karte,

Hum Toh Aapke Dil Se Karte Hain Pyar,
Aapke Husn Se Toh Hum Pyar Karte Nahi…

st: Hamara Pyar Majboor Kar Dega Aapko,
s:
Hamara Pyar Majboor Kar Dega Aapko,
Isliye Hum Dil Ko Bichhaye Baithe Hain,

Tumko Kabhi Na Kabhi Aana Hi Padega,
Isliye Hum Samaa Jalaaye Baithe Hain…

st: Aapse Pyar Karne Ko Dil Karta Hai,
s:
Aapse Pyar Karne Ko Dil Karta Hai,
Aapko Baahon Mein Bharne Ko Dil Karta Hai,

Ek Aap Hi Toh Is Duniya Mein Jispe,
Dilo Jaan Nisaar Karne Ko Dil Karta Hai…

st: Ab Uska Jikr Kya Karein Dosto,
s:
Ab Uska Jikr Kya Karein Dosto,
Jo Chhod Gaya Humko Majhdar Mein,

Woh Kya Karega Kadar Kisi Ke Pyar Ki,
Jisne Tukde Kiye Dil Ke Pahli Baar Mein….

st: Pyar Ko Jataane Wale Bahut Dekhe Hain Humne,
s:
Pyar Ko Jataane Wale Bahut Dekhe Hain Humne,
Magar Pyar Ko Nibhate Dekha Nahi Hai Koi,

Jaan De Denge Aapke Bina Hum Sabhi Kahte Hain,
Magar Jaan Ko Lutata Dekha Nahi Hai Koi….

st: Kyu Us Ajnabi Se Hum Dil Lagana Chahte Hain,
s:
Kyu Us Ajnabi Se Hum Dil Lagana Chahte Hain,
Kyu Unse Is Kadar Hum Pyar Badhana Chahte Hain,

Maalun Hai Humko Ki Unko Pana Hai Mushkil Bahut,
Fir Kyu Ek Hi Pal Mein Apna Banana Chahte Hain…

st: Hamne Pahli Bar Apni Zindagi Mein Chaha Jisko,
s:
Hamne Pahli Bar Apni Zindagi Mein Chaha Jisko,
Unse Hi Humne Apne Pyar Ka Izhaar Kar Diya,

Ab Woh Apne Dil Ko Bekarar Karein Ya Na Karein,
Magar Humne Toh Apne Dil Ko Bekarar Kar Diya…

st: Aap Kya Ho, Mere Humrahi,
s:
Aap Kya Ho, Mere Humrahi,
Jivan Ki Saari Khushi Ho Aap,
Humara Jivan Aapse Humdam,
Humare Liye To Bas Pyar Ho Aap,
Har Khushi Ke Rang Se,
Bhari Rahe Ye Zindgi Aapki,
Raho Sada Khush Yeh Aarzu He Humari…

st: Aap Hi Ke Liye Jeete Hain Aap Hi Ke Liye Marte Hain,
s:
Aap Hi Ke Liye Jeete Hain Aap Hi Ke Liye Marte Hain,
Aap Hi Ho Hamare Dilbar Jinse Hum Pyar Karte Hain,

Sabse Pyara Hai Mahboob Mera Sabse Nirali Uski Ada Hai,
Na Jaane Huyi Kya Humse Khata Jo Aalkal Rahta Hai Khafa…

st: Najron Se Najar Mili Aur Unse Pyar Ho Gaya,
s:
Najron Se Najar Mili Aur Unse Pyar Ho Gaya,
Bahut Roka Apne Dil Ko Magar Yeh Bekarar Ho Gaya,

Jab Se Kiya Pyar Tujhse Dil Ka Chain Hai Kho Gaya,
Ho Ke Juda Main Ji Na Saka Jeena Bhi Bhool Gaya…

st: Darte The Is Jaalim Jamane Se,
s:
Darte The Is Jaalim Jamane Se,
Is Liye Pyar Karte Nahi The Hum,

Aap Se Bichhdane Ka Gham Hoga Hamein,
Is Liye Ikrar Karte Nahi The Hum….

st: Haan Yeh Sach Hai Ke Hum Mohabbat Karne Se Darte Hain,
s:
Haan Yeh Sach Hai Ke Hum Mohabbat Karne Se Darte Hain,
Kyunki Yeh Pyar Baad Mein Dil Ko Bahut Tadpata Hai,

Apne Chehre Ke Aansu Toh Hum Chhupa Sakte Hain Dosto,
Magar Haal E Dil Duniya Ko Maalun Ho Jata Hai…

st: Hamari Mohabbaat Ki Baat Kuchh Is Tarah Se Faili,
s:
Hamari Mohabbaat Ki Baat Kuchh Is Tarah Se Faili,
Ki Har Ek Ki Labon Par Yeh Jubaani Ho Gayi,

Saagar Ne Toh Kiya Tha Aapse Sacha Pyar Magar,
Is Ki Mohabbat Ki Aaj Dekho Kahani Ho Gayi…

st: Dost Na Samjha Kya Hua, Dushman Hi Sahi,
s:
Dost Na Samjha Kya Hua, Dushman Hi Sahi,
Hum, Dushmani Bhi, Unko Nibhakar Dikhayenge,

Unhone Jo Manga Hai, Hamare Pyar Ke Badle,
Aap Dekhna, Hum Jaan Bhi Unko De Jaayenge…

st: Unko Yeh Sikayat Hai Humse,
s:
Unko Yeh Sikayat Hai Humse,
Ki Hum Unhe Pyar Nahi Karte,

Pyar Toh Hum Bahut Karte Hain,
Magar Kabhi Ijhaar Nahi Karte…

st: Aap Se Kyu Na Karein Pyar Hum,
s:
Aap Se Kyu Na Karein Pyar Hum,
Aap Humko Jo Achhe Lagte Ho,

Log Kahte Hain Hasee Hote Hain Bewafa,
Aya Karein Aap Toh Sache Lagte Hain…
